subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Marcus Smart scored a career-high 39 points and No. 7 Oklahoma State raced past No. 11 Memphis for a 101-80 home win in a one-sided matchup of top teams.
snippet: Marcus Smart scored a career-high 39 points and No. 7 Oklahoma State raced past No. 11 Memphis for a 101-80 home win in a one-sided matchup of top teams.
